profile: Full-stack Senior Software Developer looking to work with a team building responsive web applications using the latest technologies. Deliver consistently fast and rich user experiences to users through desktop and mobile browsers. Learn the latest programming frameworks, libraries, technologies and tools. Write clean functional and testable code that is reusable.

detailedTechnical.name: React + TypeScript + Modern Frontend
details: Next.js framework with React and TypeScript
Redux and RxJS for state management
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap

detailedTechnical.name: Node.js + Express + Backend Architecture
details: Event-driven systems with RabbitMQ and SignalR

detailedTechnical.name: AWS Cloud & DevOps
details: CI/CD with CircleCI, Jenkins, GitHub Actions

detailedTechnical.name: Web Scraping + Automation
details: AWS Lambda spot instances for scraping
Data storage in MongoDB and S3

experience.title: Lead Software Developer
achievements: Developed new Next.js micro application for Scotiabank loyalty rewards program that is shared between both banks Scotiabank and Tangerine
Implemented new OAuth flow for Scotiabank loyalty micro app as the client and Tangerine as the authentication provider
Used React Styled Components to create multiple CSS themes for Scotiabank and Tangerine to share the same micro app between banks
Implemented REST API to manage the stateless flow of the micro app
Integrated micro app with multiple third party vendors to offer rewards
Jest unit and Playwright E2E tests
experience.technologies: Next.js, React, Node.js, Express.js, Styled Components, Axios, Jest, Playwright, Mono Repo, Azure, GCP

experience.title: Founder / Lead Software Developer
achievements: Created Amazon product price search, tracking and history web application to enable users to find the best product prices by different metrics
Used Playwright to scrape Amazon product listings and add them to a MongoDB database
Created AWS EC2 to self host the React frontend application and Node.js API on one instance and MongoDB on a second instance in the same VPS
Used Event Bridge to schedule Lambda functions to launch EC2 spot instances to scrape Amazon domain data, store in S3 and upsert documents to MongoDB
Configured AWS Cloudfront and WAF as CDN for the pricedoff.com domain
Configured Ubuntu and NGINX proxy to point to PM2 service serving Node applications
experience.technologies: React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, Bootstrap CSS, Vite, Github Actions Runner, AWS (EC2, ALB, Lambda, Event Bridge, Cloudfront, Route53, S3)

experience.title: Team Lead Senior Software Developer
achievements: Developed financial payments gateway services using Node.js for the backend and React payments application to centralize customer payments across Allstate Canada's websites. Implemented JPMorgan Chase payment gateway SDK to enable payments for all major credit cards
Configured Apache Tomcat servers using Jenkins and Maven for CICD to deploy React frontend and Java backend API applications
Managed a team of four frontend developers building React components and reviewing Git pull requests. Documented application code and testing processes in Confluence
Created agile user stories for sprint epics with the project manager in JIRA
experience.technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Webpack, REST web services, Swagger API, Git, Postman, WinSCP, PuTTY

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
achievements: Worked on a dashboard application used to remotely manage building infrastructure, such as reverse work spaces such as desks and meeting rooms
Used Next.js framework, React, TypeScript, and Styled components to create full stack features from backend to frontend. Features such as a user profile page with edit functionality
Functional code using React hooks with tests written with Jest and Reacting Testing Library
Worked with multiple running services such as authentication, api and database running locally
experience.technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Styled Components, Jest, React Testing Library

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
achievements: Worked on shop.shoppersdrugmart.ca e-commerce modernization initiative to recreate the customer shopping experience using latest frontend technologies like React, React hooks, GraphQL, CSS modules and Webpack
Functional code using React hooks with tests written with Jest and Reacting Testing Library

Built accessible frontend components that are populated through API calls to GraphQL using Apollo such as desktop and mobile navigation, product filters, product tiles, drop down menus, buttons and other essential components
Worked with Loblaw's content management system Hybris to import product data and build web pages
experience.technologies: React, React Hooks, GraphQL, Apollo, CSS Modules, Webpack, Jest, React Testing Library, Hybris

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
achievements: Worked on Ownr.co an RBC Venture company that helps people easily register or incorporate a business
Used React, Redux, RxJS, Tachyons and redux-form to create Ownr front-end components and features that are mobile responsive
Fully tested components using Jest and Enzyme for unit tests. Cypress for end to end integration tests
Used Node.js with Koa framework to create backend API and microservices
Used AWS for Node.js lambda functions and DynamoDB to create and process jobs for third party vendor services such as ONCorp, Founded, Sendgrid and others
Used Docker, Github and CircleCI to automate build, test and deploy processes
Worked with integrating tools such as Google Analytics, Intercom, LogRocket, SumoLogic, Gatsby and Contenful

experience.title: Software Developer
achievements: Worked on Metrolinx's real time train tracking and management applications called TrainTrac and Trip Manager 4 (TM4) used by the Metrolinx transit control center
Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript ES6, React, Redux, Mobx and material-ui on the front-end to create UI components for creating, updating or displaying train map data
Used Axios to implement API calls to get or post data to Node.js and ASP.NET Core backend services
Used SignalR and RabbitMQ message queues to handle real time message data
Used Jest to write tests unit tests for React components

experience.title: Senior UI Developer
achievements: Worked on the final stage of RBC's fraud detection web application called Retina that will replace an existing third party application

Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript ES6, React, material-ui and ui-router on the front-end to create sections of the dashboard application. Worked with fixed data tables for React and form components with material-ui. Used RxJS to manage the state
Learned Java Spring 4 and Hibernate 5 to create an API to do CRUD operations with ORM, DAO and Services
Learned Maven and Hibernate configuration to work with hibernate transaction manager and session transactions
Learned to deploy applications using IBM Bluemix

experience.title: UI Team Lead and Senior UI Developer
achievements: Used HTML, CSS3, Bootstrap, SASS, Grunt, jQuery, AngularJS 1.5+ to help create TD Canada Trust and Mobile Appoint Booking responsive redesign
Created Mobile Appointment Booking project based on Angular 1.5 using component architecture and ui-router
Setup entire project workflow process including: directory structure, test and build using npm tasks and Grunt with grunt-parallel
Used SASS to build upon a standard framework of styles that are reusable and maintainable across TD's websites and applications
Implemented W3C web accessibility standards in HTML that were tested by QA and accessibility teams
Managed team members tasks, merged pull requests and reviewed code, maintained repositories and demo sites
Coordinated between project stakeholders such as: front-end, back-end, design and management

experience.title: Team Lead and Senior Web Application Developer
achievements: Maintained and created new features for the Flash desktop video player, including: closed captioning with sidecar and embedded CEA708 subtitles with OSMF using ActionScript 3
Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, React and video.js to create new HTML5 video player features such as responsive: video player UI, video playlists, share dialogs, and shareable video player
Involved in the rollout of the newest version of Bell Media's video player to all websites including: CraveTV, CTV, CTV News, Discovery, TSN, MTV, Much Music and many more
Implemented Krux video ad tracking library for Bell Media's video players
Worked on the video player for CraveTV site launch

Implementing video Google IMA instream ads, Omniture and ComScore tracking for Chromecast receiver. Bell Media was first to launch a Chromecast enabled app in Canada with the release of CraveTV website and mobile apps
Worked with Microsoft PlayReady streaming, HLS, HDS and M3U8 video formats
Created responsive mobile video player end screens using Facebook's React library
Implemented content authentication for desktop, mobile and Chromecast using Bell Media's authentication library

experience.title: Web Application Developer
achievements: Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, jQuery UI and jQuery Mobile to develop JavaScript single page applications (SPAs) for interactive site tours and user sign-up forms for online dating sites using MVC pattern for reusability
Used ActionScript 3 and Robotlegs MVC framework to create interactive sites, tours and video players
Used JS Render and AngularJS to display user profile data using templates
Used AngularJS to create prototype Single Page Applications for site tours and sign-ups

Worked with PHP Web Services for the web site backend API to send and retrieve site data
Created reusable custom Flash ActionScript 3 components such as date picker library for birth date for Flash applications

achievements: Developed and integrated third-party HTML5 and Flash Video Players from thePlatform into Video Centers across all of Canwest's specialty channel websites

Coded multiple custom Video Player plug-ins, including: Google DoubleClick Interactive Media Ads, Double In-Stream Ad Insertion, Omniture, Google Analytics, ComScore, Video resize functionality, Bandwidth stream switching, and custom Video Player control skins
Created custom embeddable Video Players for blogs and third party websites using Adobe Flash Builder 4.5
Created Video Ad Curtains and Selectors, a new type of Flash-in-Flash pre-roll advertisement using DoubleClick IMA SDK
Worked as lead developer on Blackberry Playbook prototype application for GlobalTV using Flash Builder 4.5

Programmed and implemented Flash photo galleries across all Canwest's specialty channel websites
Used JavaScript to communicate between web page UI and video players for analytics, banner advertisements, and player functionality
